magazine_service

Class MagazineService

  • java.lang.Object
    • magazine_service.MagazineService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class MagazineService
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The MagazineService class manages the magazine service operations, including sending emails, calculating costs, adding and removing customers.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
